data.message:
PLEASE READ, just a little something I whipped up

Thats it I've had enough I'm going to hell I'm a sinner, I'm going to put this gun to my brain but can you pull the trigger, phyc, I got the mentality to stand and fight, so come and challenge me if you dare to die, that's the reality I man the night, scared the light, right, out of site, like, when Eminem picks up a mic, he's rhyme and skill will have you climbing hills, mine will have you crawling under them, cause it's about time that my rhyme, be causing a thunder storm, my face is the lighning strike, on a frighning dike, and I'm about to give out one more
